original_title: La primera fundación de Buenos Aires
overview: In 1956, the humorous designer Oski made a work about the foundation of the city of Buenos Aires.  Fernando Birri made a film from this work in 1959, using the original text of the German explorer Ulrich Schmidel.  This film, which disappeared in the years of the dictatorship, was miraculously restored on video in 2000.  The story that the documentary describes can be compared with the situation of Latin American cinema throughout all these years.
title: La primera fundación de Buenos Aires
